meta.content:
Dear Parents:
Under direction of the governor of Nebraska, school will continue with the eLearning delivery model for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year. All spring activities have also been cancelled. A plan for graduation is in the process of being developed.
As our teachers continue to utilize this alternate delivery method, their learning plans will reflect this expectation. We...

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

span.span: Under direction of the governor of Nebraska, school will continue with the eLearning delivery model for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year. All spring activities have also been cancelled. A plan for graduation is in the process of being developed.

As our teachers continue to utilize this alternate delivery method, their learning plans will reflect this expectation. We appreciate your patience and flexibility as we continue to cooperate with direction from state government and local public health officials.

a.span: Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services

span.a: Family Preparedness Brochure from Public Health Solutions
Tips for Parents During the COVID-19 Pandemic
